ygData.subject: Re: Katheryn with a response!
ygData.msgSnippet: The tongue is part of a rogue quest I beleive. I don t remember exactly which one or where it orginates. I have found a most extensive quest list at Allakazams
ygData.messageBody:
The tongue is part of a rogue quest I beleive. I don't remember exactly
which one or where it orginates. I have found a most extensive quest list at
Allakazams Magical Realm...it is at http://everquest.gamestats.com/....see
if you can find it in there. Hope this helps.

Dawn
ie Zoya
Rodcet Nife Server
----------
>From: "Kathleen M. Kirk" <Kathleen.Kirk@...>
>To: EQ_Women@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ_women] Katheryn with a response!
>Date: Thu, Jul 8, 1999, 8:31 AM
>

>One more thing....AND I HOPE SOMEONE CAN HELP ME!!
>
>Does anyone know what to do with Rondo Dunfire's Tongue????? I have killed
>Rondo a couple of times and I have two tongues. I have done some light
>reasearch via the internet etc...but I can't seem to find a quest having to
>do with this item. If anyone knows anything about Rondo's Tongue...please
>let me know. I would appreciate it (if it's trash..I will just throw it away!!!).
>
>Thanks....
>
>Katheryn
>Bristlebane Server
>
